name: mdviewer
description: Command line Markdown to HTML viewer

scripts.build:exe: npm run build && npx pkg dist/cli.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/MdViewer.exe && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const cwd=process.cwd();const src=path.resolve(cwd,'../mdviewer.config.json');const dest=path.resolve(cwd,'dist','mdviewer.config.json');fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);"

author: MdViewer Contributors
